title: builders: ppc64le GNU/Linux builder DNS lookup is flaky
body:
The ppc64le GNU/Linux builder has failed several times recently with

    --- FAIL: TestLookupDotsWithRemoteSource (5.20s)
    lookup_test.go:513: LookupCNAME(www.mit.edu) = , lookup www.mit.edu on 192.168.60.10:53: no such host, want cname ending in . with trailing dot (mode=go)
    FAIL
    FAIL net 7.351s

@bradfitz suggests that we need to update the DNS lookup to use 8.8.8.8.
